languages.text: "Железные жрецы Фенриса умеют говорить бинарно при помощи флейт, литавр и костяных трещоток. Некоторые их ритуалы ублажения машинных духов не терпят звуков вокса".
"The Iron Priests of Fenris can speak binharic using flutes, drums, and bone rattles. Some of the rituals they used to appease machine spirits loathe the sound of the vox."
languages.original_text: "Железные жрецы Фенриса умеют говорить бинарно при помощи флейт, литавр и костяных трещоток. Некоторые их ритуалы ублажения машинных духов не терпят звуков вокса".

languages.text: “芬里斯的钢铁祭司可以用笛子、手鼓与骨头制成的拨浪鼓说出二进制语，用来安抚那些讨厌音阵声音的机魂。”
languages.original_text: "The Iron Priests of Fenris can speak binharic using flutes, drums, and bone rattles. Some of the rituals they used to appease machine spirits loathe the sound of the vox."

traits.locale_text: “芬里斯的钢铁祭司可以用笛子、手鼓与骨头制成的拨浪鼓说出二进制语，用来安抚那些讨厌音阵声音的机魂。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「フェンリスの鋼鉄法師は笛、ドラム、それに骨のラトルを使ってビンハリックで話すことが出来る。かつて機械精霊を沈めるために行われた儀式のいくつかでは、ヴォクスをひどく嫌がる」
languages.original_text: "The Iron Priests of Fenris can speak binharic using flutes, drums, and bone rattles. Some of the rituals they used to appease machine spirits loathe the sound of the vox."

traits.locale_text: 「フェンリスの鋼鉄法師は笛、ドラム、それに骨のラトルを使ってビンハリックで話すことが出来る。かつて機械精霊を沈めるために行われた儀式のいくつかでは、ヴォクスをひどく嫌がる」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Les Prêtres de Fer de Fenris peuvent parler en binhaire à l'aide de flûtes, de tambours et de crécelles en os. Certains de leurs rituels pour apaiser les esprits de la machine ne supportent pas le son d'un vox. »
languages.original_text: "The Iron Priests of Fenris can speak binharic using flutes, drums, and bone rattles. Some of the rituals they used to appease machine spirits loathe the sound of the vox."

traits.locale_text: « Les Prêtres de Fer de Fenris peuvent parler en binhaire à l'aide de flûtes, de tambours et de crécelles en os. Certains de leurs rituels pour apaiser les esprits de la machine ne supportent pas le son d'un vox. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: Los Sacerdotes de Hierro de Fenris pueden usar flautas, tambores o huesos para hablar binario. Algunos rituales que realizaron para apaciguar a los espíritus máquina implicaban evitar que el sonido del voco los perturbara».
languages.original_text: "The Iron Priests of Fenris can speak binharic using flutes, drums, and bone rattles. Some of the rituals they used to appease machine spirits loathe the sound of the vox."

traits.locale_text: Los Sacerdotes de Hierro de Fenris pueden usar flautas, tambores o huesos para hablar binario. Algunos rituales que realizaron para apaciguar a los espíritus máquina implicaban evitar que el sonido del voco los perturbara».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Die Eisenpriester von Fenris sprechen Binhär mittels Flöten, Trommeln und Knochenrasseln. Einige der Rituale, derer sie sich bedienten, um Maschinengeister zu besänftigen, verachten den Klang des Vox."
languages.original_text: "The Iron Priests of Fenris can speak binharic using flutes, drums, and bone rattles. Some of the rituals they used to appease machine spirits loathe the sound of the vox."

traits.locale_text: "Die Eisenpriester von Fenris sprechen Binhär mittels Flöten, Trommeln und Knochenrasseln. Eingie der Rituale, derer sie sich bedienten, um Maschinengeister zu besänftigen, verachten den Klang des Vox."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Fenris'in Demir Rahipleri; flütler, davullar ve kemik çıngırakları kullanarak ikilidil konuşabilir. Bu ayinlerin bazıları, voks, sesinden hoşlanmayan makine ruhlarına tesir etmede kullanılır."
languages.original_text: "The Iron Priests of Fenris can speak binharic using flutes, drums, and bone rattles. Some of the rituals they used to appease machine spirits loathe the sound of the vox."

traits.locale_text: "Fenris'in Demir Rahipleri flütler, davullar ve kemik çıngırakları kullanarak ikilidil konuşabilir. Bu ayinlerin bazıları, voks sesinden hoşlanmayan makine ruhlarına tesir etmek için kullanılır."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
